All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AuthenticationFormView
The AuthenticationFormView class represents the login view for the application.
CreateAccountFormView
This class represents the view for creating a new account.
CreateAdminUser
A utility class to create an administrator user account for the application.
CreateLessonView
A view for creating and managing lessons.
CreateQuizView
View for creating a new quiz.
CustomButton
This class represents a custom button with a default blue style.
CustomLabel
This class represents a custom label with a default form style.
CustomPasswordField
This class represents a custom password field with a default form style and preferred width.
CustomTextField
This class represents a custom text field with a default form style and preferred width.
Elements
 
ErrorHandler
This class handles error validation for user authentication and account creation.
ForgotPassWordFormView
This class represents the view for the "Forgot Password" form.
HibernateUtil
Hibernate Utility class with a convenient method to get Session Factory object.
Lesson
Represents a lesson composed of a title, a list of elements (e.g., text, image, video), and a tag that categorizes the lesson.
LessonComponent
This class is a component that represents a lesson in the list of lessons
LessonController
The LessonController class manages the creation, validation, and retrieval of Lesson objects.
LessonView
The LessonView class is responsible for displaying a lesson's content, including titles, paragraphs, images, and videos, in a user-friendly interface using JavaFX.
Log
 
LogController
This class handles the creation and management of logs in the application.
LoginAttempt
This class represents a login attempt, tracking the number of attempts and the time of the last attempt.
Main
Main class for the application that initializes and launches the JavaFX application.
MainMenuView
Represents the main menu view of the application.
MyAccountView
The MyAccountView class represents the view for the user's account settings.
Option
Option entity
OptionController
Controller for the Option entity
Paragraph
Represents a paragraph element within a lesson.
ParagraphType
 
PictureIntegration
Represents an image element integrated within a lesson.

QuestionController
